synopsis.text: Kamizaka Haruhi, inspired by a mage who saved her as a child, enrolls in a unique school that offers both regular and magic classes. Alongside her best friend and rival, Hiiragi Anri, she delves into the world of magic while searching for her mysterious savior. Her goal? To express her gratitude with a Valentine's Day chocolate. Meanwhile, Yuma Kohinata, a regular student at the same school, finds his life turned upside down when a gas explosion in the magic wing forces the magic students into the regular section. As he navigates this new magical world and the affections of various women, can he keep his academic life afloat?
